sec.div: Chemical composition of myrtle essential oil
sec.p: By using hydrodistillation method, 0.94 mL MEO was extracted from 100 g of dried leaves. The main components of MEO consists of 1,8-cineole (31.19%), α-pinene (22. 95%), linalool (12.14%), α-terpineol (5.06%), nonadecane (4.91%), linalyl acetate (4.41%), and β-phellandrene (4.26%) ( Table 1, Fig. 1).

div.p: The GC/MS chromatogram of myrtle essential oil extracted by hydrodistillation.
Chemical compositions of myrtle essential oil
